summary: Diff adds a new production build orchestrator script and enhances the existing GSC meta verification script; it also updates the service worker cache strategy/versioning and adds/updates deployment documentation. However, the diff does not show actual production deployment changes, nor does it show the verification script being wired into the production build/deploy pipeline or the meta tag being added/confirmed in the source HTML.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the latest application build (current latest version) to the production Internet Computer canisters so the public site is served at https://pd5nf-fqaaa-aaaan-qetaq-cai.icp0.io.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows scripts/docs/service-worker changes; it does not include any canister deployment configuration or automation changes (e.g., dfx deploy pipeline updates) that would evidence a production deployment of both frontend and backend to the specified canisters.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the deployed production HTML contains the Google Search Console verification meta tag in the rendered <head> on https://pd5nf-fqaaa-aaaan-qetaq-cai.icp0.io, and fail the build/deploy process if the meta tag is missing (using the existing build-time verification script).
missing_requirements.reason: While the verification script exists/was modified and a new wrapper script was added, the diff does not show (1) the meta tag being present in the HTML source template (e.g., frontend/index.html) nor (2) any change that ensures the check runs as part of the actual production build/deploy pipeline (e.g., package.json scripts/CI config).

hallucinated_features.description: Service worker cache version bump to v14 and a new fetch strategy (network-first for navigation with no-store; cache behavior changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested explicitly; REQ-46 is about deploying latest build and avoiding an older cached bundle, but this is an additional PWA/service-worker feature change beyond ensuring the GSC verification meta tag is present and deployed.

hallucinated_features.description: New/updated production deployment documentation referring to “Version 14”, service worker version updates, and a detailed manual checklist.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on deploying latest build and ensuring the existing GSC verification meta tag check is enforced; this doc content (versioning details, extra checklist items) is not explicitly requested.
